messages.content: ComfyUI-ImageReward is a custom node that allows scoring images using the ImageReward model within the ComfyUI interface.

To install ComfyUI-ImageReward, navigate to your ComfyUI directory and Python venv, then go to the custom_nodes directory and clone the ComfyUI-ImageReward repository. After cloning, install the requirements using pip.
What is the purpose of the `ImageRewardLoader` node?
The `ImageRewardLoader` node is used to load the default ImageReward model, which will be downloaded on the first run.
How do you use the `ImageRewardScore` node?

To use the `ImageRewardScore` node, connect the model, your image, and your prompt to the node. You can enter the prompt directly or convert it to an input by right-clicking the node. Then, connect the `SCORE_FLOAT` or `SCORE_STRING` output to an appropriate node.
What inputs are required for the `ImageRewardScore` node?
The `ImageRewardScore` node requires three inputs: the loaded ImageReward model, the image to be scored, and the prompt associated with the image.
Which repository should be cloned to install ComfyUI-ImageReward?
To install ComfyUI-ImageReward, clone the https://github.com/ZaneA/ComfyUI-ImageReward repository.
What is the output of the `ImageRewardScore` node?
The `ImageRewardScore` node outputs either a `SCORE_FLOAT` or `SCORE_STRING`, representing the score of the input image based on the provided prompt.
